document_data.name: ''Hauberk of Divinity''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Hauberks of divinity''''' were enchanted suits of [[paladin]] [[chainmail]] armor, encountered in [[Chult]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: These heavy chainmails were imbued with a ''+4'' enchantment to the wearer's armor. Additionally, these [[hauberk]]s improved the wearer's vitality. However, the most notable magical feature was its ability to awaken faith even in the hearts of the most stoic unbelievers.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Dragonbait]]: a [[saurial]] paladin and a one-time companion of [[Artus Cimber]] during their foray into the jungles of [[Chult]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
